column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Our server was great
column2: super nice and attentive. The food was delicious as well
column3: I got the rib eye steak which was a solid 8.5/10
column4: the crab cake was just WOW WOW WOW. Best crab cake I've ever had in my life solid 12/10. The sorbet ice cream at the end was very good as well
column5: nothing mind blowing but then again it's ice cream so it's pretty standard
